resources.string: %1$s requires one or more Google Play services that are not currently available. Please contact the developer for assistance.
"%1$s won't work unless you enable Google Play services."
"%1$s won't run without Google Play services, which are missing from your phone."
"%1$s won't run without Google Play services, which are missing from your tablet."
The specified account does not exist on this device. Please choose a different account.
A data connection is required to connect to Google Play services.
Accessing accounts from a restricted profile is not supported.
Error signing in the specified account. Please choose a different account.
%1$s is having trouble with Google Play services. If the problem persists, please contact the developer for assistance.
%1$s relies on Google Play services, which is not supported by your device. Contact the manufacturer for assistance.
"%1$s won't run unless you update Google Play services."
"%1$s won't run without Google Play services, which are currently updating."
New version of Google Play services needed. It will update itself shortly.
Get donation package for additional features
Additional experimental features can be activated in main menu.

"Greenify will raise the voice of community to be heard by the developers of your greenified apps, for better recognition of device experience in app development.
To raise your voice, Greenify collects anonymous data without privacy information. You can opt-out at any time."
Your voice can make a difference!
(Place name of primary translators here for credit)

"This accessibility service is required for some special features in Greenify.
You may be warned about potential privacy risk, that's just a regular informative warning for any accessibility service. We promise NEVER EVER collecting your personal information in this accessibility service.
Some Samsung devices has voice talking issue if any accessibility service is enabled. If you are experiencing this issue, enabled the workaround in \"Settings\" here."
Allow Greenify to turn off screen immediately after automated hibernation.
If disabled, Greenify will be unable to automate the hibernation when screen is off.
You will be brought to launcher now. Open the app, then click the picker notification to pick that app.
App in this state is usually unsafe to hibernate. Force hibernation may cause function interruption or even data loss.

"Cut off the wake-up path may break the functionality of this app or the dependent apps.
If anything bad happens, please reattach the cut-off.
Affected: [%s]"
Despite degreenified, app still stays in hibernation (all its background functionality will not work) until you wake it up by explicitly launching it.
Donation package is corrupted. Please re-install it from Google Play.
Do you really want to greenify %1$s
Greenifying system apps is currently an experimental feature available only with donation package.
Sorry, system app is not safe to be greenified in general.
Failed to activate this feature. It may be incompatible with your ROM.

"This feature is currently only available in donation package.
Purchase the donation package now to unlock all experimental features."
Failed to perform this operation. Please ensure the root privilege is granted.

"Thanks for your donation to support the development.
You can now activate the additional experimental features from main menu."
Failed to verify the donation. Please check your network condition and try again later.
Cannot verify the donation, please report this error.
Please update this app to the latest version.
You attempt to greenify the app of default launcher. It is not recommended to greenify frequently using apps.
Xposed module of Greenify is not activated yet. You need to activate it in Xposed installer first for these features to work.
Start your app, then click here to pick it.
"First start your app. Then click this notification of APP PICKER."
If you are experiencing random voice talking

Some apps exploit a vulnerability of Android (before 4.3) to gain unfair priority to keep in memory in low-memory situation. Those apps will be false recognized as \"Perceptible\" in Greenify and not hibernating.
Better performance and compatibility, especially if you are experiencing hibernation failure or ROOT issues.

"Allow GCM push message to wake up hibernated apps, except if its notification is disabled in system (Settings - Apps). Please also enable \"Don't Remove Notifications\" to avoid losing notifications after re-hibernation."
Working in \"Boost Mode\" (see below) which is the recommended mode.
Deprive system apps of immunity to hibernation, make most of them greenifiable.
Allow telephony events (like call, SMS) to wake up hibernated apps, thus greenified call or SMS-aware apps working as expected.
Coalesce periodic CPU wake-up timer for all apps (not just apps designed for 4.4+), to reduce battery waste in dispersive CPU wake-ups. (Requires Android 4.4+)
Track which app explicitly woke your greenified apps, and optionally cut off the wake-up path to eliminate further wake-ups.

"These apps scheduled themselves for silent running, thus may slow down the device and drain the battery.
Beware of those waking your device frequently."
Will hibernate in minutes after screen goes off
These apps are woken and become idle now, you need to manually put them back to hibernation.
Greenify will not put these apps into hibernation automatically due to shown reasons, unless state changes later.
May slow down the device when…

"These apps may slow down the device when centain events happen, in arbitrary degree.
More apps here, less responsive on the events."

"Apps running in background will use a certain amount of memory, and may slow down the device in arbitrary degree.
Keep this list as short as possible."
This manual process can be automated via an accessibility service provided with Greenify.
In non-root mode, hibernation has to be performed in this way due to restriction of Android system. Please click the \"Force stop\" button above to finish hibernation.
Enable or disable accessibility service of Greenify here
This app has no launcher entry.

"Please make sure root privilege is granted to Greenify. (some root management tool require explicitly re-granting for every update of app)
If you still experience hibernation failure, please try another root management tool or \"Boost Mode\" in experimental features."
Cannot switch to your launcher, please manually press the Home button.

"GCM (Google Cloud Messaging) is integrated into this app, and may be used for push notification. It will not work any more if greenified.
An experimental feature in donation package enables GCM push for greenified apps."
The default behavior of pull-up gesture on Home button is reset.
You have opted-out. No anonymous statistics will be collected.
"Auto-hibernation is disabled. Greenified apps will no longer hibernate automatically."
A shortcut is created in your launcher for one-click hibernation.
Sorry, only available in root mode.
smooth and lasting experience just like on the first day.
about house keeping, let Greenify silently do it for you.
battery leeching, memory hogging and stealthily running apps.

"Cut off all wake-up paths may break the functionality of this app or the dependent apps.
If anything bad happens, please reattach the cut-off."

For non-root mode, automate the hibernation minutes after screen goes off. It will light up the screen, perform the hibernation and then turn off the screen. (Requires Android 4.1+, Accessibility, Device Admin and insecure key-guard)
"Enforce aggressive policies to hibernated apps, stopping them from being woken by other apps. WARNING: may break cross-app functionality of hibernated apps!"

"Don't remove notifications when app hibernates (only while screen is off), so you could read notifications afterward. Status bar icon of the original notification cannot be preserved, due to privilege restriction. The Xposed-based version of this feature below has no such limitation."
"Don't remove notifications when app hibernates, so you could read notifications afterward."
Reveal hidden account sync tasks in \"Settings - Accounts\", prefixed with \"*\".
Working in non-root mode. If your device is actually rooted, please enable this option to release full power of Greenify.
Working in root mode. If your device is actually NOT rooted, please disable this option to ensure correct functionality.
Deprive some system apps of immunity to hibernation, make them greenifiable. Due to technical limitation, hibernated system apps may not always stay in hibernation as non-system apps.
Auto-hibernation service was stopped. If this is shown frequently, Greenify might be blocked by 3rd-party tool or system settings.
Auto-hibernation service is being restarted… (probably due to low free memory)
Sorry, automatic hibernation cannot work if secure key-guard is set. You can use \"Hibernate and Lock Screen\" shortcut alternatively.
Sorry, automatic hibernation cannot work if secure key-guard is set. \"Pull up\" gesture on \"Home\" soft-key is recommended for \"Hibernate and Lock Screen\" shortcut.
Sign-in your Google account to activate donation package.
Sorry, auto-hibernation in non-root mode does not support your device (or ROM) yet.
Automate the app hibernation (on non-root device). Disable this service will break auto-hibernation.
\"Draw on top\" permission is not granted, please grant it to Greenify in AppOps or permission settings of your device.
Permission is required to detect and avoid hibernating foreground app
Sorry, not yet compatible with this ROM.

"Shallow hibernation is an entirely new hibernation mechanism built exclusively for Android 6.0+, with better compatibility and efficiency.
Apps will no longer be killed in shallow hibernation, with interaction context preserved for snappier task switching, while all the background behaviors are still strictly prohibited during hibernation.
Shallow-hibernated apps will be woken for a brief time periodically in hours and immediately upon HIGH priority GCM push (only if GCM priority is implemented by app developer). They will also keep awake during charging.
If enabled, shallow hibernation replaces the classic hibernation mechanism throughout Greenify.
This feature is NOT suggested for low memory device."
Sorry, donation package is not found for your Google account.
Accessibility service of Greenify needs to be activated to automate hibernation.
Device-admin of Greenify needs to be activated to perform auto-hibernation after screen goes off.
\"Draw on top\" permission is required to perform silent auto-hibernation while screen is off.
1 在下个页面中单击图示的绿色守护条目
2 点击右侧的开关打包绿色激活辅助功能（激活过程会提示进行二次确认）
1.在下个页面中单击图示的绿色守护条目
1.点击图示中的查看权限使用应用条目
2.授予绿色守护查看应用程序使用状态权限

"Enter doze mode in minutes (instead of hours stationary normally) after the screen goes off if not charging, to improve its power-saving efforts.
Doze mode is a new power saving mechanism introduced in Android 6.0. In this mode, background behaviors of all apps (except white-listed) are strictly prohibited, until next user interaction or charging. The device will also periodically (in hours) exit doze mode briefly."
"Long-press the center button in bottom navigation bar to hibernate apps and lock screen, or just lock screen. Beware, this feature may be incompatible with Smart Lock and finger-print unlock."
"Use alternative method to turn off screen, slower but compatible with Smart Lock and fingerprint unlock. It may not work on some devices."
Apps in the white list will not be affected by Doze mode (including the normal doze in Android). They also do not support Shallow Hibernation.
Shallow-hibernated apps will be woken for several minutes when charging is started and also periodically for a brief time, then back to hibernation afterwards.
